title: FIA gets one more day custody ex-chairman PARC
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP):A local court on Thursday granted the FIA further one day physical custody of ex-chairman Pakistan Agriculture and Research Council Dr. Ghulam Muhammad Ali andÂ  Director Establishment Division Akhlaq Ahmed in illegal recruitment
The accused were produced before the court of Judicial Magistrate Ahmed Shehzad Gondal after the completion of
During the hearing, the FIA requested for another 7-day physical remand of the accused. The prosecutor said that the Chairman PARC has been arrested on charges of illegal recruitments and misuse of powers. The Chairman PARC recruited 332 people illegally on 164 approved posts. Now, evidence and further investigation are underway.
The court extended the physical remand of the accused by 1 day. Both the accused will be presented in court again on July 18 after the completion of the remand. The FIA has registered a case against 19 officers including PARC Chairman Dr. Ghulam Muhammad Ali. The Public Accounts Committee had handed over the matter of the PARC to the FIA.
